settings.title: Unlock Exclusive Trade Benefits with Loom Collection

settings.text:
Transform your design vision with our tailored trade program for interior designers, decorators, developers and architects.

Enjoy exclusive benefits, personalized support, and early access to our latest collections.

Partner with us for stunning interiors with the perfect blend of style, functionality and craftsmanship.

settings.title: Become a Trade Partner
settings.text:
Transform your design vision with our tailored trade program for interior designers, developers, architects and decorators.

Enjoy exclusive discounts, personalized support, and early access to our latest collections.

settings.title: Approved Trade Members
settings.text:
Unlock a world of exclusive perks designed to support your projects and business. Enjoy personalized trade benefits, curated recommendations, and early access to our latest designs and collections.
Stay ahead with industry insights and our custom furniture options for unique project needs

settings.title: Trade Program
settings.text:
We are excited to announce our trade program to fellow decorators,designers and architects. The following are our Trade Program Criteria:

- Valid Business License 

- Active Website

- Comprehensive Portfolio

- Social Media Presence

Please fill in the registration form if you wish to apply
